Token.Abstract: The PWRouteOverlayRenderer class defines the basic behavior for drawing a route-based overlay. The renderer draws the visual representation of a PWRouteStep object.
The polyline that the overlay renderer is currently drawing. (read-only)
The polyline that the overlay renderer is currently drawing. (read-only)
The polyline that the overlay renderer is currently drawing. (read-only)
Initializes and returns the route overlay renderer and associates it with the specified route overlay object.

Parameter.Name: overlay
Parameter.Abstract: The route overlay to initialize the renderer with. The route overlay contains several important pieces of information the route renderer needs to draw the route.

Parameter.Name: buildingOverlay
Parameter.Abstract: The building overlay to initiatize the renderer with. The route overlay communicates with the building overlay to switch floors if necessary.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The mapView to initiatize the renderer with. The mapView is needed for the renderer to know the current zoom workaround state.
